item.title: [Python] 2D physics simulation with Box2d and wxPython
item.description: Reinforcement learning is showing signs that it will be hot next year due to the environment of gym and DeepMind, but after all, do you often want to solve your own short (robot control) problem? In - Qiita which made the environment of the line tracer like OpenAI I/F, the line tracer ignoring the physical laws was moving around, but in the future, To tackle issues that consider tire grip and gravitational acceleration, we must incorporate physics into our simulation.
